ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] First time I was lucky.  Second time cursed by the RNG?
ygData.msgSnippet: The spot you re looking for is right where Xanasus (sp?) the named Treant spawns... there s a hill right in front of him where you can camp.  I believe
ygData.messageBody:
The spot you're looking for is right where Xanasus (sp?) the named Treant
spawns... there's a hill right in front of him where you can camp. I
believe Griffons, Griffawns, and Griffennes are generated from this spawn
point, but I'm not totally sure. And my experience mirrors your 2nd
attempt... Many, many, many Griffennes (more than 5) before getting the
charm. The Shaman quest item (feather I believe) seemed to be much more
common.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony

> I guess I got spoiled in that the first two griffenes I killed dropped
> charms. Not certain how rare the drop is so I guess not looting one on
five
> attempts is nothing to get too concerned over. Its just a nuisiance at
this
> point. IIRC, someone posted a long time ago on the list a method to
> guarantee a griffenne would spawn. The poster mentioned a /loc to go to
> somewhere in NK. Does anyone remember the details of this post? Also, I
> recall someone saying that the only mobs who were placeholders for
> griffennes were griffawns. Killing the other mobs in NK will not increase
> the chances of getting a griffenne to spawn. Is that true?
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
